wikipedia_page.main: Duncan Irvine was a Scotland international rugby union player.

response: Scotland: Bill Maclagan, Malcolm Cross, Ninian Finlay, John Alexander Neilson, James Campbell, Robert Ainslie, Duncan Irvine, JB Brown, EN Ewart, RW Irvine capt., AG Petrie, JHS Graham, Henry Melville Napier, NT Brewis, JE Junor
He was the brother of Duncan Irvine who was also capped for Scotland.
